document.discussion_title: FootGolf to kick off at Warrior Run in Norwalk
document.topic_text: FootGolf to kick off at Warrior Run in Norwalk Monday, April 25, 2016 10:26 AM What happens when you combine golf and soccer? FootGolf, and it's debuting at a metro golf course this May. Warrior Run Golf Course in Norwalk, is introducing a FootGolf course in May. FootGolf requires players to kick a soccer ball into a 21-inch diameter cup, using as few attempts as possible. Combining elements of soccer with those of golf, FootGolf is quickly growing in popularity throughout the United States. "There's a big demand for more outdoor activities, and everyone, at any age, can walk and kick a ball," said Alex Rich, a FootGolf spokesperson. The American FootGolf League certifies courses across the country. Westwood Golf Course in Newton also has a certified course.
